title: Language Identification of Social Media Code-Mixed Texts: Simulation-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic natural language processing concepts and foundational understanding of machine learning
context.additional_context: Focuses on hands-on practice analyzing real social media data via VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Explain the deep learning model architecture for word-level language identification in Hindi-English code-mixed texts
Compare and analyze the characteristics of code-mixed texts across social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp)
Implement code-mixed text processing workflows using smartphone-based VR simulations in resource-constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
